name: Return of the Incredible Machine: Contraptions
name_original: Return of the Incredible Machine: Contraptions
description:
Return of the Incredible Machine: Contraptions is a puzzle game developed by Sierra Attractions. It was originally released in 2000. It was published by Sierra On-Line. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Return of the Incredible Machine: Contraptions is available on PC.
